edu.stanford.pigir.pigudf

Class PartOfSpeechTag

  • java.lang.Object
      • edu.stanford.pigir.pigudf.PartOfSpeechTag

  • public class PartOfSpeechTag
extends
    Pig UDF function to tag text with parts of speech markers. The function takes either plain text, or HTML/XML. The output is a tuple of 2-tuples. Each 2-tuple consists of one word from the given text, and one part of speech tag (defined below).

    The following options are available in various combinations:

    • Only generate output for text within a given HTML/XML tag.
    • Only generate output for a small number of POS tags, as defined in standardPartsOfSpeechToOutput below. The different variants of grammatical entities are mapped into simple forms. For example: Noun, and noun singular are both tagged with Noun (NN) for this option.
    • Only generate output for an explicitly provided set of parts of speech tags.
    List of POS tags:
    1. CC Coordinating conjunction
    2. CD Cardinal number
    3. DT Determiner
    4. EX Existential there
    5. FW Foreign word
    6. IN Preposition or subordinating conjunction
    7. JJ Adjective
    8. JJR Adjective, comparative
    9. JJS Adjective, superlative
    10. LS List item marker
    11. MD Modal
    12. NN Noun, singular or mass
    13. NNS Noun, plural
    14. NNP Proper noun, singular
    15. NNPS Proper noun, plural
    16. PDT Predeterminer
    17. POS Possessive ending
    18. PRP Personal pronoun
    19. PRP$ Possessive pronoun
    20. RB Adverb
    21. RBR Adverb, comparative
    22. RBS Adverb, superlative
    23. RP Particle
    24. SYM Symbol
    25. TO to
    26. UH Interjection
    27. VB Verb, base form
    28. VBD Verb, past tense
    29. VBG Verb, gerund or present participle
    30. VBN Verb, past participle
    31. VBP Verb, non3rd person singular present
    32. VBZ Verb, 3rd person singular present
    33. WDT Whdeterminer
    34. WP Whpronoun
    35. WP$ Possessive whï¿½pronoun
    36. WRB Whadverb

      • PartOfSpeechTag

        public PartOfSpeechTag(java.lang.String theHTMLTags,
               java.lang.String outputStandardPOSTags,
               java.lang.String POSTagsToOutput)
        Parameters:
        theHTMLTags. - If theHTMLTags is a string of tags, those are passed into the call to runTagger() of the POS tagger.
        outputStandardPOSTags. - If outputStandardPOSTags is TRUE, then only words tagged with the parts of speech defined in the HashMap standardPartsOfSpeechToOutput will be included in the output.
        POSTagsToOutput. - If this is a non-empty string, and outputStandardPOSTags is false, then the string is expected to be a space separated list of parts of speech tags. Only words tagged with tags in this parameter will be included in the output.
